text.text_translated: One night in 2003, Suzanne Collins was watching TV. She was changing the channels. At that time, there was a war in Iraq. She saw two different shows on TV. One show was about young people. They tried to win a lot of money. The other show was news about the war. The two ideas mixed together in her head. This felt very strange. So, she had the idea for The Hunger Games.
